issue.title: [CI] CUDA nightly docker upload fails due to wrong tag
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-18188](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-18188). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Due to the different CUDA version required for this job vs the version in .env the CUDA envvar needs to be set in the push step too to generate the correct tag.

https://github.com/ursacomputing/crossbow/actions/runs/3341920350/jobs/5533611188#step:7:9

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-18188?focusedCommentId=17625798) by Joris Van den Bossche (jorisvandenbossche):*
Issue resolved by pull request 14538
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/14538>
